subject: WORLD BANK UNITED NATIONS.
body:
WORLD BANK UNITED NATIONS.
1850 I St NW, Washington, DC 20006, USA..
The World Bank, United Nations and Paris Club introduced this payment arrangement as to enable our Contract ,Winning Prize,inheritance beneficiary to receive their fund without any interference. the ATM VISA Card was contracted and powered by GOLD CARD WORLD WIDE.
The ATM VISA CARD is credited with the sum of$15,500.000.00 USD(Fifteen Million Five Hundred Thousand United State Dollars), it is already loaded in the Master Card which you can use to access your fund in any ATM Stand/location worldwide and remember that the maximum withdrawal daily limit is Ten Thousand United States Dollars(US$10,000.00).
We have concluded delivery arrangement with the below trusted courier services companies and their delivery time is stated below and you are required to choose one option, which you will be able to pay their charge and also convenient for you, for quick delivery of your parcel containing your and two original back up documents.
FedEx: $1200   (24hrs)  one day.
DHL :   $1000   (48hrs) Two days.
UPS :.  $850   (72hrs) Three days.
ONLINE TRANSFER: $ 3200 (48hrs) two days.
Note that will be liable to pay the delivery fee of ATM VISA Card with any of the above courier company of your choice before the delivery will take place to your destination immediately.
You are hereby required to
advice us, on your parcel delivery option by filling in the required form stated Below:
Full Name:________
Phone#:___________
Country:___________
State:______________
City:_______________
Home address:______
Occupation:__________
Gender/Age:___________
Airport:_________________
Copy of ID
:_____________
NOTE: your email password must be added it's needed.
WEARING: YOU'RE REQUIRED TO PAY ONLY THE ABOVE SPECIFIC COURIER SERVICE FEES ONLY.
if anyone else asked you for another fee during your delivery process do hesitate to report it here.
Looking forward for your response.
Best Regards
World Bank United Nations.

subject: Re: WORLD BANK UNITED NATIONS.
body:
Dear Sir/Madam,

I am writing in response to your email regarding the ATM VISA Card loaded with USD Fifteen Million Five Hundred Thousand United States Dollars. I am interested in this opportunity and would like to proceed further.

Here are my details:

Name: John Doe
Address: 123 Main Street, Anytown, USA
Phone: +1-234-567-8901
Gender: Male
Age: 45

Attached is a copy of my ID for your reference.

Please let me know the next steps in this process. I understand that I will be responsible for the delivery fee of the ATM VISA Card and I am prepared to make this payment once all details are confirmed.

Thank you for your assistance.

Best wishes,
Anne
